[[1974â75 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1974â75]] |} The [[1973â74 Turkish First Football League|1973â74]] season was the sixth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish First Football League]], the first level division in [[Turkey]]. They have relegated to second division at the end of the season. The club address was "Azakhan No: 4", Tel.: 1321.
